name: Star Wars: Attack Of The Sprites
name_original: Star Wars: Attack Of The Sprites
description:
Firstly, please note this game contains unlicensed material, and is intended for non-commercial use.

Hello everyone, I am currently one month into using Unity and C#. I wanted to make a game to better my skills, so I began developing a spin-off of the classic Atari game "Space Invaders". Once I began development, I thought it would be fun to give it a Star Wars theme.

I am very happy with how this turned out. There were many features I wanted to add to this, but It was time to move onto the next project.

Please ignore video frame-rate as performance is much better in-game.

Website: https://releasethespartan.wordpress.com/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MillarBrandon
